| RED COLOR THEME
|----------------------------------------------------------------------------

/*
	BASE COLOR CODE: #F54B00
	BASE COLOR END (FOR GRADIENT): #eb462a
	HOVER COLOR: #e9452a
*/
/******************** GLOBAL STYLES ********************/
a {
  color: #F54B00;
}
.text-color {
  color: #F54B00;
}
.icon {
  fill: #F54B00;
}
.shape-bg {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #F54B00, #eb462a);
}
.gradient-bg {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #F54B00, #eb462a);
}
.icon-border-1 {
  border: 1px solid #F54B00;
}
.icon-border-2 {
  border: 2px solid #F54B00;
}
.btn-base {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #F54B00, #eb462a);
}
.btn-base:after {
  background: #e9452a;
}
.btn-trans {
  color: #F54B00;
  border: 2px solid #F54B00;
}
.btn-trans .icon {
  fill: #F54B00;
}
.btn-trans:hover,
.btn-trans:focus,
.btn-trans:active {
  background-color: #e9452a;
  border-color: #e9452a;
}
.btn-white {
  color: #F54B00;
}
.tab-btn li.active a {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #F54B00, #eb462a);
}
.filter-buttons .active {
  color: #F54B00;
}

  color: #F54B00;
  background-color: transparent;
}

  color: #F54B00;
}
.navbar-toggle {
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #F54B00, #eb462a);
}
